lines.speaker: Ghost
lines.text: Whooo... A living soul dares to enter my domain!

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: I... I didn't mean to intrude.

lines.speaker: Ghost
lines.text: Well, since you're here, perhaps you can help me with a task.

lines.speaker: Ghost
lines.text: You've returned! And you've completed the task!

lines.speaker: Player
lines.text: Yes, it wasn't easy, but I managed to do it.

lines.speaker: Ghost
lines.text: I'm eternally grateful. Now I can finally rest in peace.
